reviews.review_text: This place is wonderful. It’s like an isolated haven on earth. You can view the sunset and hear the ocean waves from here. Service is beyond excellent, waiters are very helpful and attentive. Food is extremely tasty. There’s three cute dogs as well. Had a great time. Thank you

Visited with my family for lunch. What a gorgeous, cozy place offering beautiful view of the beach. Apart from the standout food and drinks, their hospitality won our hearts. Mr Neville who is the owner recommended us food on his own according to our taste. The margarita is one of the best I have had. They have three friendly dogs who are super adorable. You will be lucky if you find Josh who will tell you all the perfect spots for the most instagramable pictures. Overall experience was super nice.

In a recent visit to Goa, we had the opportunity to visit Pousada by the beach and boy were we bowled over by the hospitality. Neville himself came and attended to each table and made sure that everyone was comfortable. The place itself gives a very relaxed vibe and faces a clean beach.

We went by Neville’s recommendations for food and were not disappointed. The food was fresh and delectable and the cocktails potent. What stood out for us was the hospitality, attention to detail and of course the amazing food that was served.

The dogs that belong to Pousada by the beach were also well looked after and amiable.

This is a must visit if you are looking for excellent service, good food and some serenity by the beach.
